summary: Two old men - a white former radical, and a black retired janitor - strike up an unusual and funny friendship on a park bench in New York, where they deal with family, drug dealers, and the pitfalls of age.

keywords: communist|socialist|old jewish man|old african american man|building superintendent
title: Dos viejos chiflados
